title: Colleen Bawn Recipe
full_text:
Colleen Bawn Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
rye whiskey
1 1/2
ounces
Benedictine
1 1/2
ounces
green Chartreuse
1
very fresh
egg
1
teaspoon
sugar
, to taste
Nutmeg
and ground cinnamon, for garnish
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake very hard, without ice, until the egg is well mixed with the other ingredients, about 10 seconds. Add ice and shake again for about 10 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glasses; garnish with a grating of fresh nutmeg and ground cinnamon.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker, cocktail strainer, fine grater
Whiskey
